1.title: The Council: Part 1

episode of.title: Surge of Power: Big City Chronicles (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Avengers Assemble. Season 2 kicks off with The Council. Part 1 is about the TV Avengers - who are all brought together, on screen for the first time "Surge of Power: Revenge of the Sequel".

2.title: The Council: Part 2

episode of.title: Surge of Power: Big City Chronicles (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: Fantastic Four. Part 2 features the half of The Council who are all of the hero cast of the original "Fantastic Four" movie made by Roger Corman, reunited on screen for the first time in over 20 years.

3.title: Surge Meets Kel Mitchell

episode of.title: Surge of Power: Big City Chronicles (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Surge, meets Kel Mitchell who played Invisible Boy in the 1999 Ben Stiller and Geoffrey Rush superhero satire film "The Mystery Men."

4.title: Doctor Who Tribute: Surge v. Daleks

episode of.title: Surge of Power: Big City Chronicles (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: We celebrate Doctor Who with this special tribute. With appearances by Colin Baker, Paul McGann, and Eric Robert. We celebrate over 50 years and 13 incarnations of Doctor Who. Surge, is up against the Daleks. Can Surge and his companion, Antonio, protect Earth from a Dalek invasion?

5.title: Surge Meets Gates McFadden

episode of.title: Surge of Power: Big City Chronicles (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: Surge, meets Gates McFadden, best known as Doctor Beverly Crusher from "Star Trek: The Next Generation." Gates discusses her career in acting and choreography, her work with Jim Henson and the Muppets and opening her own theater.

6.title: Surge in Big City Park

episode of.title: Surge of Power: Big City Chronicles (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: What does Surge do on his downtime? Watch cinema's first out gay superhero enjoy some leisure time in Big City Park on his day off from crime fighting.

7.title: Tribute to Noel Neill

episode of.title: Surge of Power: Big City Chronicles (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: The original Lois Lane from the "Adventures of Superman" TV show, Noel Neill, returned to Surge's world of Big City, to reprise her role as Aunt Lois. Noel shares stories of her work with George Reeves and Jack Larson on "Adventures of Superman."

8.title: Surge Meets Jack Larson

episode of.title: Surge of Power: Big City Chronicles (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: Surge visits the original Jimmy Olson, Jack Larson, at his home in Beverly Hills. Standing next to Jack's beloved green Volkswagon beetle. Jack discusses his career and working on the "Adventures of Superman" TV show.

9.title: Omen's Super Friends

episode of.title: Surge of Power: Big City Chronicles (TV Series 2017– )

9.plot: Nichelle Nichols reprises her role as Omen in "Surge of Power: Revenge of the Sequel". Omen has 3 super friends secretly watching over Big City who have all played DC Comics characters: John Newton, Shannon Farnon, and Michael Gray.

10.title: Omen's Champions

episode of.title: Surge of Power: Big City Chronicles (TV Series 2017– )

10.plot: Omen and her super friends realize that Omen's champion, Surge, will need help against The Council. Omen views other potential champions. Watch as we explore these other pre-existing, indie superhero characters from other artists.

11.title: Surge in Spain La Palma Rosa Film Festival

episode of.title: Surge of Power: Big City Chronicles (TV Series 2017– )

11.plot: Surge flew to Spain for the first double-feature of "Surge of Power" movies, which occurred at the La Palma Rosa LGBTI Festival of Film and Culture in Sitges, Spain on Labor Day Weekend 2017.

12.title: Surge Meets Elektra, Elodie Yung

episode of.title: Surge of Power: Big City Chronicles (TV Series 2017– )

12.plot: Surge meets Elodie Yung, who plays Elektra in the "Daredevil" and "Defenders" series on Netflix. Elodie and Surge interview each other and and there is a surprise walk-through cameo of Jon Bernthal, who plays The Punisher on Netflix.

13.title: Surge meets Bryan Brandenburg

episode of.title: Surge of Power: Big City Chronicles (TV Series 2017– )

13.plot: Surge meets marketing expert Bryan Brandenburg, co-founder of Fan X Salt Lake Comic Convention, a young comic convention that quickly grew to the 3rd largest in the nation.

14.title: Surge meets Dan Farr

episode of.title: Surge of Power: Big City Chronicles (TV Series 2017– )

14.plot: Surge meets Dan Farr, the famous Utah businessman and entrepreneur and co-founder of Fan X Salt Lake Comic Convention, discusses how he connects with the local community and made this young comic convention grow to the nation's 3rd largest.

15.title: Surge Meets Eric "The Smoke" Moran

episode of.title: Surge of Power: Big City Chronicles (TV Series 2017– )

15.plot: Surge meets famous wrestler, cosplayer, and actor Eric Moran as he explains his tenure in the military and as a pro wrestler called The Smoke.

16.title: Lou Ferrigno Returns for the Sequel

episode of.title: Surge of Power: Big City Chronicles (TV Series 2017– )

16.plot: Lou Ferrigno returns to shoot with us on the Surge sequel and discusses superheroes, his legacy as The Incredible Hulk, and the fun of reuniting with his superhero friends on the big screen.

17.title: Surge meets Wonder Woman, Shannon Farnon

episode of.title: Surge of Power: Big City Chronicles (TV Series 2017– )

17.plot: Surge meets Shannon Farnon and discusses her presence as the longest running Wonder Woman actress, playing the role on "Super Friends" for 10 years. She plays the artificial intelligence for our hero's car.

18.title: Surge meets the Wonder Twins

episode of.title: Surge of Power: Big City Chronicles (TV Series 2017– )

18.plot: Surge meets voice actors B. J. Ward and Michael Bell, famous for their portrayal of the Wonder Twins on the Super Friends cartoon and for inventing the fist bump.

19.title: Surge meets Black Lightning, Cress Williams

episode of.title: Surge of Power: Big City Chronicles (TV Series 2017– )

19.plot: Surge meets Cress Williams at Great Philadelphia Comic Con. Cress portrays Jefferson Pierce, the electricity wielding DC Comics superhero Black Lightning on the TV show Black Lightning on the CW.

20.title: Surge Goes Car Shopping

episode of.title: Surge of Power: Big City Chronicles (TV Series 2017– )

20.plot: Featuring Shannon Farnon, reprising her role as M.A.V.I.S., the spunky and motherly artificial intelligence of the Surgemobile from "Surge of Power: Revenge of the Sequel." Surge goes car shopping, much to the displeasure of M.A.V.I.S.

1.title: What Is Surge of Power?

episode of.title: Surge of Power: Big City Chronicles (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: In this first episode, Surge of Power is discussed, starting with the first Surge of Power project, "Surge of Power: The Stuff of Heroes", introducing cinema's first out gay superhero and the sequel, "Surge of Power: Revenge of the Sequel".

2.title: Surge Meets John Barrowman

episode of.title: Surge of Power: Big City Chronicles (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: Surge interviews openly gay actor, John Barrowman, at Salt Lake Comic Con. Barrowman rose to fame as the pan-sexual Captain Jack Harkness in the popular British science fiction TV show "Doctor Who."

3.title: The NBC Interview

episode of.title: Surge of Power: Big City Chronicles (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Surge discusses an interview on NBC News where Vincent J. Roth was invited into the NBC studio on April 3, 2005 to discuss the movie and its upcoming screening of 'Surge of Power: The Stuff of Heroes'.

4.title: Surge Meets June Lockhart

episode of.title: Surge of Power: Big City Chronicles (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: Surge interviews actress June Lockhart at The Hollywood Autograph Show in Los Angeles, California. Lockhart is best known as Maureen Robinson, the mother in the 1960s TV show 'Lost in Space'.

5.title: Sequel Sneak Peak "Comedians" Scene

episode of.title: Surge of Power: Big City Chronicles (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: Surge treats viewers to a sneak peak at 'Surge of Power: Revenge of the Sequel' by showing an entire scene from the sequel, featuring the Las Vegas comedy team of Tony and Lloyd.

6.title: Surge Meets Rebecca Staab

episode of.title: Surge of Power: Big City Chronicles (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: Surge interviews actress Rebecca Staab at Echo Park in Los Angeles. Staab is the original Susan Storm in the original "Fantastic Four" movie made by Roger Corman in 1994.

7.title: What Does the Surge Emblem Mean?

episode of.title: Surge of Power: Big City Chronicles (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: Openly gay superhero, Surge, answers fan question on how the Surge emblem was created and what does it mean. Surge invites executive producer, Vincent J. Roth, to explain how he came up with the Surge emblem.

8.title: Surge Meets Reb Brown

episode of.title: Surge of Power: Big City Chronicles (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: Surge interviews actor Reb Brown, Steve Rogers Jr., aka Captain America, from the 1979 TV movie.

9.title: The Stuff of Heroes Theatrical Premiere

episode of.title: Surge of Power: Big City Chronicles (TV Series 2017– )

9.plot: From the red carpet of the 'Surge of Power: The Stuff of Heroes' theatrical premiere. This event marks the release of the first movie and memorializes Surge as cinema's first out gay superhero. Featuring Nichelle Nichols and Noel Neill.

10.title: Surge Meets Kevin Sorbo

episode of.title: Surge of Power: Big City Chronicles (TV Series 2017– )

10.plot: Surge interviews actor Kevin Sorbo at Salt Lake Comic Con. Kevin Sorbo is famous for playing Hercules on the hit TV show 'Hercules: The Legendary Journeys.'

11.title: The Battle Suit

episode of.title: Surge of Power: Big City Chronicles (TV Series 2017– )

11.plot: Display of the Surge of Power 'battle suit' at the famous Masquerade at San Diego Comic Con in 2004.

12.title: Surge Meets Walter Jones

episode of.title: Surge of Power: Big City Chronicles (TV Series 2017– )

12.plot: Surge is at Salt Lake Comic Con and interviews Walter Jones, the original Black Power Ranger from 'Mighty Morphin' Power Rangers.' Walter portrayed the Black Ranger in 85 episodes of the original American series.

13.title: The Fox News Interview

episode of.title: Surge of Power: Big City Chronicles (TV Series 2017– )

13.plot: FOX News was at the World Premiere of "Surge of Power: The Stuff of Heroes" on August 29, 2004 outside the Arbor Cinema theater in Austin, Texas.

14.title: Surge Meets Jack Coleman

episode of.title: Surge of Power: Big City Chronicles (TV Series 2017– )

14.plot: Surge interviews Jack Coleman at the Hollywood Autograph Show in Los Angeles, CA. Jack is gained broad attention for his role of Noah Bennet on the hit television series 'Heroes'.

15.title: Sizzle Reel - Reactions to Sequel

episode of.title: Surge of Power: Big City Chronicles (TV Series 2017– )

15.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

16.title: Surge Meets Paul McGann

episode of.title: Surge of Power: Big City Chronicles (TV Series 2017– )

16.plot: Surge interviews Paul McGann at the Salt Lake Comic Con. Paul McGann became widely known to American audiences for his portrayal of the Eighth Doctor in the Dr. Who movie, series, and audio books.

17.title: Christmas Special: Surge Meets Spider-Boy

episode of.title: Surge of Power: Big City Chronicles (TV Series 2017– )

17.plot: A special Christmas episode. The photo of the young boy in the Spider-Man costume was so popular we gave him his own episode. Watch Spider-Boy interview Surge at New Jersey Comic Expo.

imdb.title: Surge of Power: Big City Chronicles
akas: Surge of Power: Big City Chronicles (United States)
